Name: Sandals of Mesehti
Description: Two sandal soles were found among the funerary equipment of Mesehti, Mayor of Asiut. They were included so that he could stand upright and move about in the netherworld. This pair is the open type of sandal that has a V-shaped band across the front to hold the foot and a band around the heel. The bands are painted white and two small wooden pieces on each side of the soles support the bands.
